name: whileOutputEffect
signature: { <Out, R2>(f: (out: Out) => Effect<boolean, never, R2>): <In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R2 | R>; <Out, In, R, R2>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: (out: Out) => Effect<boolean, never, R2>): Schedule<Out, In, R | R2>; }
description:
Returns a new schedule that continues execution for as long as the given
effectful predicate on the output evaluates to `true`.
*Details This function modifies an existing schedule so that it only continues
execution while an effectful condition holds true for its output. If the
effectful predicate returns `false`, the schedule stops.
documentation:
Returns a new schedule that continues execution for as long as the given
effectful predicate on the output evaluates to `true`.
*Details**

This function modifies an existing schedule so that it only continues
execution while an effectful condition holds true for its output. If the
effectful predicate returns `false`, the schedule stops.
